Consider the following ANSI  C program.
 
 
 
#include <stdio.h>
 
 
 
int main()
 
 
 
{
 
 
 
 
int i , j,count;

GATE 2021

Computer Science Engineering

11

count=0;
 
 
 
 
i=0;
 
 
 
 
for(j=-3;j<=3;j++) 
 
 
 
{ 
 
 
 
 
 
if(j >= 0)&&(i++))
 
 
 
 
 
count=count+j;
 
 
 
 
}
 
 
 
 
count=count+i;
 
 
 
 
printf("%d",count);
 
 
 
 
return 0;
 
 
 
} 
 
Which one of the following options is correct?
 
 
(A) The program will compile successfully and output 8 when executed. 
 
(B) The program will not compile successfully.
 
 
(C) The program will compile successfully and output 10 when executed. 
 
(D) The program will compile successfully and output 13 when executed. 
Ans.  C
